page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content:
Besides the Health Centre the area has several surgeries and one dentist. For serious accidents people have to be taken to hospital in Abergavenny or Newport_both over 12 miles away.
Services connected with the Health Centre also visit schools_ the school nurse,dentist and speech therapist;the sheltered housing schemes and some houses with bedridden patients. At present these services are facing cut-backs.The most noticeable to us are the checks carried out at school by the school nurse.
In general the area is well served by the Health Service but in winter the weather causes some problems with transport to and from hospitals.
